props.title: Promotional assets
props.innerHtml: I have worked on major cross-platform promotional campaigns for QVC such as seasonal sales and Black Friday. The assets I created have been used on the homepage of the eCommerce site but also on marketing material, social platforms and TV.

props.text: Main banner, paper cut style vector assets

images.alt: Summer Sale 2019 Clearance page desktop view
images.caption: Desktop view

images.alt: Summer Sale 2019 Clearance page mobile view
images.caption: Mobile view

props.innerHtml: Modules on QVC Clearance page

props.text: Similar concept to the Summer Sale banner above. I also incorporated the business requirement to have a fully red image with a winter feel.

props.body: I designed multiple seasonal vouchers which are a key element of QVC's retention business strategy as they are a good incentive for customers to come back. The creative for those vouchers were used across multiple platforms.

props.text: Creative concept based on a composite of Christmas flat lay images.

props.innerHtml: Responsive banner displayed at the top of all the QVC website pages

props.text: Creative concept based on a composite of graphics and stock images of icecreams for a summery look and feel.

props.innerHtml: Modules on QVC website homepage
